ingredients.name: rice flour
ingredients.substitute: You can reduce to 1 tbsp to get soft dosa

ingredients.name: Water
ingredients.substitute: A little more or less water

directions.step: 1. To make the wheat dosa, mix the flour, salt, chillies, curry leaves, onions, ginger and cumin with water to make think runny batter. If using curd you can also add it now.
2. If using a pan that doesn't have a non-stick coating, add few drops of oil smear it well. Rub the tawa with small piece of onion and heat it.
3.When the tawa is hot enough. Pour the batter thinly from a little height, do not spread it like normal dosa.
4. Drizzle some oil towards the edges. When it is cooked, raise the dosa with a wooden spoon.
5. Flip it and cook on the other side if the dosa is thick. Flip back and cook to get a crispy dosa.
6. To make more dosas, if the pan is very hot sprinkle little water. When the water evaporates, you can make another dosa.
7. Serve wheat dosa with your favorite chutney
